person.persName: Robert Boyd (Whitley Circuit Court clerk and Laurel County attorney)

body.p: London, Kentucky, circuit court clerk and attorney. Boyds Bend, Kentucky, native. Son of Samuel Boyd and Mary A. Sears Boyd. Attended the common school in Whitley County. Attended Centre College in Danville, Kentucky. Read law with Judge Green Adams, in Barboursville, Kentucky, in 1855. Clerk of the Whitley Circuit Court from 1856 to 1862. Admitted to the bar in 1858. Relocated and practiced law in London, in 1863.
